short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fresh new tab page showing your most visited sites and a search bar powered by Yahoo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Freshview Newtab is your go-to Chrome extension for an enhanced browsing experience, combining style and functionality into one sleek package. Transform your new tab into a personalized productivity hub with these standout features:

Top Sites Shortcuts: Quickly access your most visited websites through dynamic, visually appealing shortcuts tailored to your browsing habits.

Yahoo-Powered Search Bar : Enjoy fast and accurate web searches with the trusted power of Yahoo, right at your fingertips.

Freshview Newtab brings convenience and efficiency to your browser with its intuitive design and user-friendly interface. Upgrade your browsing journey today!
